verses.name: Acts 1:8
verses.text: But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judea, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.

verses.name: Acts 1:9
verses.text: And when he had spoken these things, while they beheld, he was taken up; and a cloud received him out of their sight.

verses.name: Acts 1:10
verses.text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel;
